org.drip.analytics.curve

Class DerivedFXBasisCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.definition.FXBasisCurve
        • org.drip.analytics.curve.DerivedFXBasisCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve

    public class DerivedFXBasisCurve
extends FXBasisCurve
    This class implements the FXBasis curve representing term structure of FX basis. Basis can be full or bootstrapped.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.drip.service.stream.Serializer

        public DerivedFXBasisCurve(CurrencyPair cp,
                   JulianDate dtSpot,
                   double dblFXSpot,
                   double[] adblDate,
                   double[] adblFXBasis,
                   boolean bIsFXBasisBootstrapped)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs an FXBasis instance from the currency pair, FX Spot, and FX basis parameters
        Parameters:
        cp - Currency Pair
        dtSpot - Spot Date
        dblFXSpot - FX Spot
        adblDate - Array of dates
        adblFXBasis - Array of FX Basis
        bIsFXBasisBootstrapped - True if the inputs are for bootstrapped FX basis
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the FXBasis instance cannot be created
